text:
I have 3 cats, and one has struggled to consistently use the litter box for the last year. We ruled out medical problems and confirmed it's due to stress. I tried all of the recommended stress relievers: extra litter boxes, different styles of boxes, pheromone diffusers/collars, calming treats, and even her own private room the other cats can't reach. Nothing was working. Only thing that worked was to kick her outside during the day.

We recently moved and she needs to stay indoors, and I've been struggling with the accidents.

I can't believe I didn't stumble on this litter sooner. I added a box of this and she hasn't had an accident since! It's been over a week so far. Not to mention the odor control and tight clumps are amazing. It isn't dusty like most clay litters are. Perhaps a bit pricey, but cheaper than the natural corn/cassava or grass seed-based litter I bought!

If this litter isn't the golden ticket for your cat, step back and assess if there's a medical problem or other stress factors and try to eliminate those before calling the litter a failure!

It seems expensive at first, but because it clumps so tightly, there‚Äôs never a slushy pee at the bottom of the box, so you never have to fully dump and wash the box. You just scoop - comes out completely clean, no odors! - and add a bit as it gets low. The attractive agent draws the cats right in. Within a day, my cats were using their boxes again like champs. I now buy 1/3 of the cat litter we were buying and am actually saving money only buying this brand. Saving labor, smells, and,frustration, too. Highly recommend.
